(重)《天蝎行动》主要讲述，被骗至南非数载，全部家产都被 郑南顺 (李南星 饰) 的父亲夺走的 谢廷璋 (李铭顺 饰) 与年轻的珠宝鉴定师 叶林 (陈松伶 饰) 在南非相爱成婚。因为黑吃黑被黑帮追杀，廷璋诈死后来到新加坡才知道郑父已故，廷璋发现不知内情的南顺继承了大笔财产而且对叶颇有好感，为复仇廷璋制定了“天蝎行动”，并放弃了叶林，与同被郑父害死父母的律师王重光配合，先帮南顺对付他的对手郭保罗，令郭保罗生意破产，公司也被南顺收购。并助南顺登上珠宝业主席的宝座。同时南顺向叶林求婚成功。然而就在南顺和叶林注册的那一天，郑母出车祸身亡，买凶杀人的郭保罗逃走了。而南顺将和叶林结婚的前夕，又收到叶林当年和廷璋在南非结婚的资料。此事对叶林伤害极深，她在教堂逃婚了。.

When he arrives, he felt a tug on his heart when he sees Tangxin drenched. (PG)(重)唐心约耀进见面，耀进决定赴约之际，采月突然出现，告诉他自己一直以来只是把他当替身，从来没有喜欢过他，希望耀进珍惜对他好的人，耀进一时难以接受。耀进想起唐心，急忙赶去赴约，见唐心已经被雨淋成落汤鸡，心里有所触动。.

programme.title: 天蝎行动 Coup De Scorpion - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) The story begins with Ye Lin being sent to South Africa on work assignment where she meets the dashing Xie Ting Zhang. The disheartened Ye returns to Singapore and starts life anew in a jewelry group run by young entrepreneur Zheng Nan Shun. Nan takes a liking to Ye and begins to pursue er. Just as Ye was about to accept and marry Nan, Yan resurfaces.... (重)《天蝎行动》主要讲述，被骗至南非数载，全部家产都被 郑南顺 (李南星 饰) 的父亲夺走的 谢廷璋 (李铭顺 饰) 与年轻的珠宝鉴定师 叶林 (陈松伶 饰) 在南非相爱成婚。因为黑吃黑被黑帮追杀，廷璋诈死后来到新加坡才知道郑父已故，廷璋发现不知内情的南顺继承了大笔财产而且对叶颇有好感，为复仇廷璋制定了“天蝎行动”，并放弃了叶林，与同被郑父害死父母的律师王重光配合，先帮南顺对付他的对手郭保罗，令郭保罗生意破产，公司也被南顺收购。并助南顺登上珠宝业主席的宝座。同时南顺向叶林求婚成功。然而就在南顺和叶林注册的那一天，郑母出车祸身亡，买凶杀人的郭保罗逃走了。而南顺将和叶林结婚的前夕，又收到叶林当年和廷璋在南非结婚的资料。此事对叶林伤害极深，她在教堂逃婚了。.

programme.desc: (R) Tiger, Jielun and Feifei are best friends. Lingling, the trio's study group leader finds them her worst nightmare because they are not interested in their studies. One day, Tiger meets a scientist who gives him a box of "happy matchsticks" which gives the trio whatever they desire. However, as soon as the fire on the matchstick extinguishes, their wishes and illusions vanish. Lingling urges them to stop by telling them that the desires are just illusions, and wants them to face reality and work hard. Will the trio listen and change or will they continue on with their mistakes? (重)Tiger, 哲伦 和菲菲是死党。小组长玲玲聪明伶俐，不喜欢三人在学业上差劲的态度。有一天，Tiger 遇见一位给他"快乐火柴"的科学家。"快乐火柴"能够给三人无限的快乐，三人要什么就有什么。可是，当火柴一熄灭，他们的欲望和理想都会消失。玲玲劝他们脚踏实地，面对现实。三人会否听她的劝告改过自新还是死不悔改呢？.

programme.desc: With veteran hawkers retiring and few young people entering the trade, how can Singapore keep our hawker culture alive? Will we lose part of our heritage? 过去数十年，小贩们都沿街叫卖，一直到1970年代，随着国家更宏观的发展计划，新加坡的小贩才陆续搬到小贩中心里去。 现在，小贩中心以及它们所售卖的食物，已经成了新加坡人日常生活的一部分。 然而，在这座城市朝第一世界国家的愿景迈进之时，这份珍贵的遗产却很可能因为青黄不接而销声匿迹。 受过良好教育又对烹饪颇有心得的新一代小贩，有着难以磨灭的热忱。他们可以成功创业，并像小贩先辈那样，坚持守住这一份事业吗？ 小贩文化会走到尽头吗？又或者，它会继续被保留并受到珍惜？.

programme.desc: (R) Little Monkey King wants to become the Great Monkey King, so he went out to acquire skills. On the way, in order to avoid the puppy, he transformed himself into a doll. Dabaos father bought him home, to live with their family. (重)小小美猴王要成为真正的美猴王 ,还需要学习许许多多的本领，于是他外出学艺。在途中为了躲避小狗，他变成一个布娃娃，被大宝爸爸买回家，与他们全家人生活在一起。.

programme.title: 三生三世十里桃花 Eternal Love - EP 55
programme.desc: (R) Qingcang uses the flesh and blood of Lijing's siblings to practice sorcery. Lijing uses his blood to summon Qingcang's spirit to the Great Purple Palace to settle their feud and attain peace for the world. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)擎苍将离镜兄妹三人的血骨做降头。离镜用自己的血召唤擎苍元神，在大紫明宫的祭坛之上与擎苍做个了断，还天下一个太平。.

programme.title: 万福楼 Bountiful Blessings - EP 20
programme.desc: (R) Fuxi loses part of her memory after being knocked out by Pin Hong. She remembers Dafeng but cannot remember Dong Hai and Xiao Fei. While Dafeng wants her to forget Dong Hai, he feels bad that Xiao Fei is sad, and decides to hire a well-known doctor to treat Fuxi. Pin Hong suddenly re-appears. (重)（大结局）福喜被品红撞晕后失去部分记忆，只记得大丰，却忘了小菲和东海。大丰有私心，不想福喜记得东海，但见小菲因为妈妈不记得她而伤心，大丰于心不忍，请名医帮福喜恢复记忆，可惜名医也束手无策。这时候，品红又回来报仇….

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 280
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 千年来说对不起 Till We Meet Again - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Caiyue is back in the human form, and goes back to work. She realizes Pierre has taken over Yaojing's place in the company. Used to be "Warrior God" in the company, Yaojing loses all his energy and do whatever is given to him. Caiyue is shocked when she finds out that Yaojing and Tangxin are in a relationship. (PG)(重)采月恢复人形，回去上班，却发现皮尔取代耀进的位置，外号“战神"的耀进则失去往日的风采，任人使唤，令采月一时难以接受。更令她大受打击的是，耀进竟然与唐心交往。师徒相恋，大错铸成，采月担心扭转乾坤的希望将落空！.

programme.title: 狮城有约 Hello Singapore - EP 50
programme.desc: (Live) Delivering the day's latest news and social features that matter to you. Every Monday to Friday, from 6.30pm to 7.30pm on Channel 8. （现场直播）总结一天大小事，关心属于你我的家园。每逢星期一至五，傍晚6.30-7.30pm，与你相约！.

programme.title: 溏心风暴 3 Heart And Greed S30006A
programme.desc: The families of Yongzheng and Yalin attend a meeting to discuss the various appointments for the top management after the merger. They get into a heated argument. Old Mrs Xu would rather liquidate Xu Group than to merge with the Huangs. (PG)(第6集上) 许、黄两家开会洽谈合并后许旺公司的人事安排，惟双方火星撞地球而拉倒。许老太愿做家族罪人，建议清盘也不合并。.

programme.title: 学长学姐好样的！ Thumbs Up! Senior - EP 2
programme.desc: This episode features a packaging-free grocery store that hope to reduce food wastage and packaging by encouraging its customers to pack their purchases with their own reusable containers and grocery bags. However, local consumers are not familiar with such business model. How does one encourage people to pursue a sustainable lifestyle in Singapore? Watch how the Senior comes up with solutions! 本地有一家为了减少食物和包装浪费而开设的的无包装杂货店。顾客须自备容器来购物，但多数消费者还不太习惯这种购买方式。看本集学长是如何招兵买马、想方设法提高大众的环保意识，以及推广这种无包装的消费概念！.

programme.title: 致胜出击 The Good Fight - EP 16
programme.desc: Wenkai is under immense stress from Dongshan's intense training. Yichen is afraid that history may repeat itself and advices him to not train Wenkai too much. Dongshan points out that Wenkai is as talented as Yifeng and insists that he fulfils his expectations. Yichen feels helpless as she's afraid that Dongshan is unable to accept the fact that he indirectly caused Yifeng's death due to stress. (PG)东山训练文凯，让文凯备感压力。逸晨担心历史重演，劝父亲不要对文凯过度训练。东山指文凯和逸风一样有天赋，坚持要让文凯完成他当年对逸风的期望。逸晨无奈，但担心东山会受打击，不敢说出逸风因压力而致死的事实。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news. 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 亡者之声 2 Whispers Of The Dead S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) From the charred remains found in a badly burnt Nissan Coupe in Mandai, Professor Chao identifies the victim. He then determines that the victim was killed before the car was burnt, and that the fire was an attempt to destroy the evidence. (PG13-暴力镜头)(重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 魔女的法庭 Witch At Court - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Yalin is worried after she found out Xiantai is stalking her. To get elected as the mayor, Zhao Jiashu helped Mayi by finding out Xiantai's plans. To Mayi's shock, Xiantai is on his way to abduct Yalin! (PG13-性相关语)(重)贤泰一直跟踪雅凛的行踪，让雅凛时刻不安。赵甲树为当选市长，暗地帮马翌找出贤泰的计划。这时，马翌才发现贤泰正前往绑架雅凛的路上！.

programme.title: 天蝎行动 Coup De Scorpion - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) The story begins with Ye Lin being sent to South Africa on work assignment where she meets the dashing Xie Ting Zhang. In a whirlwind of romance, the couple falls in love and exchange marital vows. Tragedy strikes when Xie gets mysteriously killed by mobsters. The disheartened Ye returns to Singapore and starts life anew in a jewelry group run by young entrepreneur Zheng Nan Shun. Nan takes a liking to Ye and begins to pursue er. Just as Ye was about to accept and marry Nan, Yan resurfaces.... (重)《天蝎行动》主要讲述，被骗至南非数载，全部家产都被 郑南顺 (李南星 饰) 的父亲夺走的 谢廷璋 (李铭顺 饰) 与年轻的珠宝鉴定师 叶林 (陈松伶 饰) 在南非相爱成婚。因为黑吃黑被黑帮追杀，廷璋诈死后来到新加坡才知道郑父已故，廷璋发现不知内情的南顺继承了大笔财产而且对叶颇有好感，为复仇廷璋制定了“天蝎行动”，并放弃了叶林，与同被郑父害死父母的律师王重光配合，先帮南顺对付他的对手郭保罗，令郭保罗生意破产，公司也被南顺收购。并助南顺登上珠宝业主席的宝座。同时南顺向叶林求婚成功。然而就在南顺和叶林注册的那一天，郑母出车祸身亡，买凶杀人的郭保罗逃走了。而南顺将和叶林结婚的前夕，又收到叶林当年和廷璋在南非结婚的资料。此事对叶林伤害极深，她在教堂逃婚了。.

programme.title: 真的不一样 Fake It So Real - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Water is the basis of all beings and a vital resource to mankind. Lee Teng will show viewers the types of water and the origins. He heads to Malaysia and Japan to learn about natural mineral water and back to Singapore to see how we can make use of technology to create safe and clean drinking water. (重)水，万物之本，人类最重要的资源。首先，李腾将带领观众认识水的种类及来源，接着前往马来西亚及日本，进一步了解何谓天然矿泉水。最后回返新加坡，看看缺乏天然淡水资源的岛国，如何凭借科技工艺，让国人安心用水。.

programme.desc: (R) In this last episode, the four dialect groups that participate in the last round of competition are Teochew, Hokkien, Canto and Hakka. The two dialect groups with the highest scores will challenge the final round and incorporate the three elements "Poetry, Wine and Flower" into their creative dish. The dish which meets the criteria of taste, cooking skill, setting and creativity will be the winner of this series. (重)《翻乡找味》最后一集主题为"琴棋书画诗酒花"。四组晋级的籍贯为：潮州、福建、广东和客家。4组人将各别面对以"琴棋书画"主题的挑战，考验大家对地方乐器和中国象棋的认识、传统且精致的书籍装帧、以及挑战一笔画生肖。两组成功过关的籍贯，进入最后回合，把"诗酒花"三大元素融入自创菜肴中，达到口感、厨艺、摆盘和创意，4大评分标准夺得最后的胜利。.

programme.title: 新过番客 A Sojourn Home - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) "A Sojourn Home" follows foreign workers from India, Bangladesh, the Philippines, Myanmar, Indonesia and more who came to Singapore to find a living. The series documents how some make it big and return home with affluence, while others are disappointed and forced to leave crestfallen. The series highlights their determination and will-power to succeed, showing us a side of foreign workers we normally do not see. (重)《新过番客》关注着一些来自印度，孟加拉，菲律宾，缅甸，印度尼西亚国家等等的外劳。他们离家背景，远来到新加坡发展和赚钱养家。这一系列的纪录片让我们看到他们的成功与失败，有些富裕的回到家乡，有些却因失败而被迫离开。这纪录片显示了他们坚强的意志，决心和勇往直前的精神，让我们看到他们的另一面。.

They later visit the tofu factory to understand the tofu manufacturing process. Lastly, they work together to cook a challenging dish, Hakka Yong Tau Foo. (重)在最后一集的节目中，不爱吃豆腐的姐妹俩在主持人的协助下，不仅煮出与炸薯条口感相似的炸豆干条，还吃得津津有味！她们也走访豆腐工厂，了解豆腐的制作过程。最后，姐妹俩合作无间，完成了难度颇高的客家酿豆腐！.

Worried about their future, Xin Xin and Xiao Yi went for matchmaking arranged by their family members. (重)心心和孝义是两个生活互不交叉的孤身男女。心心是个新娘化妆师，与患有焦躁症的母亲同住；孝义则是个摄影师，照顾患有夜盲症的父亲，两人都因为父母的关系而耽搁了婚姻。在朋友和家人的安排下，两人前往相亲….

programme.desc: (R) Caiyue questioned Yaojing on why he is dating Tangxin and sadly asked why can't they get back together like a thousand years ago. Yaojing insists Caiyue is the one who rejected him and asked her to leave him alone. Caiyue is dejected and decided to wish Yaojing and Tangxin all the best. (PG)(重)采月质问耀进为何要与唐心交往，伤心地说他们再也无法回去一千年前。耀进却说是采月拒绝他在先，亲口说出以后不会再纠缠他，采月却说自己没有说过这样的话。采月灰心之下，说反正自己就要灰飞烟灭了，祝福他和唐心能够幸福快乐。.

programme.desc: Located more than 200 miles north of Tokyo, Niigata is famous for Nishikigoi, or koi in short. programme.title: 看见你的声音 I Can See Your Voice - EP 8

programme.title: 加文纳桥的约定 Love At Cavenagh Bridge - EP 9

(PG)(重)每一年的这一天，编剧汉良和富太莉娜都会放下工作，放下家庭，放下所有重要事情，风雨不改来到加纹纳桥上“幽会"。原来这一天是两人多年前的“相逢纪念日"……那一年，失意的编剧碰上被老公劈腿的贵妇，两人本来生无可恋，却在自杀前互相鼓励，互相扶持，竟然一起度过难关，走出阴霾。逐渐地，两人的关系已经升华得比自己枕边人更重要的地位。两人发乎情却止于礼，可是这算不算是一种精神出轨呢？.

(PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)俊英搜集到亨奎跟智妍幽会的证据，在办公室跟亨奎摊牌。同一时间，珊玉上门送糕点给俊英。俊英将亨奎勾搭智妍及恩将仇报的事告诉珊玉，当着珊玉的面羞辱亨奎。珊玉明知亨奎有错在先，却袒护亨奎，对俊英破口大骂，还推俊英。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 8
programme.desc: Ting-en recognizes Xianyu as the bigwig who helped her out in the U.S. three years ago. Xianyu worries about how he can continue to keep his identity under wraps. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)廷恩认出贤宇就是三年前曾经帮助过她的黄金街代表。贤宇思考如何继续隐瞒他的身份。.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 3 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 3 - EP 8
programme.desc: Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. programme.title: 上食堂 Food Notes - EP 2

Join us in this episode of Food Notes to discover the amazing world of Herbal Cuisine in Korea! (重)节目让观众大快朵颐之际，也深入了解这些美食背后各个幕后英雄是如何让眼前的美食发扬光大。除了介绍各个厨师、馆子是如何使出十八般武艺烹煮美食外，节目也会将镜头转向养殖场、捕捞过程及相关行业，让观众更全面和深入的了解，这些美食的过去、现在甚至将来！.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 63
programme.desc: (R) Taizhen tells Xizhen about Yuncan having a child one day before the parents' meeting session. Xizhen is upset and turns up late the following day. Xizhen tells Yuncan that she will continue with the wedding if he promises to listen to her in future. Yuncan promises to be obedient. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)举行相见礼前一晚，太真将允灿有孩子的事告诉熙真。熙真受打击，大哭大闹，但没有将事情告知父母。相见礼当天，熙真迟迟未出现。正当政淑要离开时，熙真才到场。熙真对允灿说若他可以一辈子听她的话，就照原定计划结婚。允灿答应。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 64
programme.desc: (R) Shanying goes to Seoul to ask Yuzhen if he has found Haixiu. Shanying bumps into Guixi outside the hospital. She is sure that Guixi is the person who cheated her of a big sum of money years ago, causing her to be thrown out of the house by Junjiu. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)善英担心海秀，到首尔找宇真问他有何进展。善英在医院门口看到贵熙，紧抓着她不放，贵熙却否认认识善英。善英告诉宇真贵熙多年前骗走她的钱，害她被俊九赶出家门，从此跟海秀分开。.

programme.title: 治愈者 Healer - EP 21

programme.title: 怪食记 Weird Food Diaries - EP 1
programme.desc: In "Weird Food Diaries", avid foodie Rosalyn Lee (also known as Rozz) goes in search of Asia's most bizarre eats. When Yisheng finds out that Yingmin is related to Dong-Kang Pharmaceutical's stock manipulation, he asks Taijun for help. The team of five decides to work together again to reclaim the victims' money. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)太骏在监狱服刑出来后，生活变得颠倒，儿子去世，妻子离开了他, 他陷入了悲伤之中。 同时，义声被股神骗子英民骗走了他所有的钱， 当义声发现英民与东江制药的股票操纵有关时，义声去寻找太骏帮忙，五人小组决定再次合作，以收回他和其他受害者的钱。.

programme.title: 看见看不见的你 I See You - EP 3

In the course of completing their mission, Kai En is angry to discover that 748 has reneged on his deal with her. programme.title: 美食世家 2 Food Empire 2 - EP 8

Singapore's craving for that beautiful old flame must be satisfied! (重).

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) This episode, Pornsak explores the processing of coconuts & coconut milk production in Thailand and milk source & milk processing in Australia. programme.title: 奇异特工 Odd-upation - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Social Networks allow men and women to interact more, leading to more extramarital affairs. Many are willing to pay for mistress-dissuaders to restore their marriages and husbands faith. What do mistress-dissuaders do, and what are the skills needed? Let's find out more with the host in China. (重)发达的社交网络催生了异性之间更多相互接触的机会，使得婚姻出轨的现象更为严重。许多人为了挽救婚姻，挽回丈夫的心，不惜重金礼聘“小三劝退师"来帮忙。究竟“小三劝退师"的工作是什么？要把小三给劝退，需要什么本事？请跟随奇异特工黄靖伦到中国一探究竟。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Every year, 6 out of 10 Philippinos whom died from illness, are still denied of medical attention at their deathbeds. Jojo Goh travels to Philippines, an isolated and typhoon-prone Sabtang island with less than 2000 villagers. She discovers the many hats worn by the only doctor serving there. (重)每10名菲律宾人病死当中，仍有6人临死前无法得到医疗照顾。主持人吴俐璇千里迢迢到与世隔绝的沙坦岛，拜访在孤岛下乡行医的年轻医生，了解他如何在资源匮乏的环境下，只身照顾将近2000名岛民。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 65

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 66

programme.desc: (R) Despite bearing the responsibility of looking after the household, women are also putting more focus on their careers. Is this burden too much for women to bear? Exactly how will they strike this balance? Let us investigate on how men and women determine their level of happiness in life! (重)要照顾家庭又要兼顾事业，现代女人压力非常大！所以女人到底快乐吗？女人同时希望做个独立自主，但又渴望依赖男人；究竟女人应该怎么平衡两性关系？且看男人女人如何为自己的快乐指数打分，记得收看这一集的节目！.
